name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an experienced Automation Engineer with a strong focus on **Python**, **PowerShell**, and **Bash**, I bring 8 years of expertise in automating complex Microsoft infrastructure environments. My proficiency in managing **Microsoft 365**, **Active Directory**, and **Windows Server** equips me to streamline operations and enhance system performance. I am well-versed in **Git** for version control and utilize tools such as **FreshService** and **ServiceNow** for effective service management. Additionally, I leverage **Azure** cloud services along with **Ansible**, **Terraform**, and **DSC** to create robust automation solutions that boost operational efficiency.

My experience extends to developing full-stack solutions using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Flutter**, as well as frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have successfully integrated AI/ML capabilities into enterprise-grade platforms, utilizing predictive analytics and real-time data processing. With a solid foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, I ensure that applications are not only high-performing but also comply with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
